issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Whenever I click a little too fast on the Studio interface, it would crash and not start again.

In the console I have the error from the title:

WARNING: The Gestalt selector gestaltSystemVersion is returning 10.9.4 instead of 10.10.4. Use NSProcessInfo's operatingSystemVersion property to get correct system version number.

In the past I just needed to delete the file

*~/Library/Saved Application State/com.appcelerator.appcelerator-studio.savedState*

But now this workaround doesn't work anymore.
fields.summary: WARNING: The Gestalt selector gestaltSystemVersion is returning 10.9.4 instead of 10.10.4. Use NSProcessInfo's operatingSystemVersion property to get correct system version number.

comments.body:
Hello,

Please follow these steps below

1. Uninstall your SDK and reinstall it.
2. Open Studio, if it asks for any update then click for update.

Check now for the issue.

If the problem still persist, send us your studio and diagnostic log.

*To find studio log:*

open Studio and navigate to
Help>Studio>View Log File

*And to find diagnostic log:*
Help>Studio>Run Diagnostic Test..

Thanks.

Hello,

Could you please update to the latest Appcelerator builds and let us know if you still face this issue.

Thanks.
